name: Skull Survivor
storyline:
You are the “Skull” Survivor of the ancient soul consuming phantoms. Survive the relentless horde with your chosen familiar. How long can you keep your familiar alive? The longer you can survive the move permanent upgrades you will have access to. Each time you brave the dark realms you will have access to increasingly powerful upgrades. Could you eventually control more of those who attack you?
Skull survivor is a survivor "Bullet Heaven" style rogue like auto-shooter with a twin stick melee style twist! Move around your avatar while swinging your melee weapon around the screen at the same time. All abilities are auto shooter, and you will be able to place your melee weapon on auto pilot for the option of a true auto shooter experience!
summary: Swing your nimble weapon at hordes of enemies! Collect the souls of your fallen enemies and reinforce your skull. Exterminate thousands of Vampires, Zombies, and Demons. Choose the best build and compound your abilities to deal the most damage possible to the onslaught.
